summary: A cross-country airliner, whose passengers include a nuclear physicist, a rocket expert, and a mathematical genius, is drawn beyond radar range by an unknown, unbreakable force.
cast: Craig Hill|Paula Raymond|Dayton Lummis|Gregory Morton|Harvey Stephens|John Bryant|Nancy Hale|Addison Richards|Brad Trumbull|Bernadette Hale|Meg Wyllie|Roy Engel|Paul Bradley|Ralph Brooks|Stephen Ellsworth Crowley|Francis De Sales|Sam Harris|Eden Hartford|Joe Haworth|Jerry James|Jack Mann|Harold Miller|Murray Pollack|Carl Princi|Tony Regan|Leoda Richards|Norman Stevans|Ed Stoddard|Bob Whitney
keywords: tribunal|rocket propulsion|stopped time|unexplained events|crisis onboard an airplane
